snippet: Actually, Doris Duke did. But her Mughal Suite, now on view, has about 1,001 delights.
abstract: Doris Duke Foundation for Islamic Art in Honolulu has restored private Mughal Suite and will celebrate its opening to public with series of talks, concerts and dance performances.
lead_paragraph: Actually, Doris Duke did. But her Mughal Suite, now on view, has about 1,001 delights.
